name: Pablo: A Goopy Goopers Journey
description:
Long ago,... (just around last tuesday) a young goopy creature named Pablo was snoozing away on his favorite rock, when he suddenly woke up in a new strange, seemingly empty place, consisting of a selection of rooms, where time seemingly resets itself on a steady basis. Stuck there, and with limited time and physical mass at his disposal, Pablo must now brave this strange new place and the obstacles within, and find a way out before time sends him back to square one.

Will Pablo make it out and return to his favorite rock to snooze once more?

i have no idea?

Programming: DeltaNeverUsed

Art: ASillyVole

Music/Sfx: Osun (https://www.youtube.com/osun6)
